titleStmt.title: Dauids comfort at Ziklag A plaine sermon made in time of dearth and scarcitie of corne and worke. By Robert Harris.
titleStmt.author: Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Young] for Iohn Bartlet, at the gilt Cup in Cheape-side,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Also issued as part of Harris's "Six sermons never heretofore published".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
